metadata.synopsis: Omeluum tells the player he will aid them in saving the rest of the hostages as he joins a bit abruptly in gameplay - this can be a useful tool to ease this
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically on the first turn after Omeluum is freed

0.speaker: Omeluum
0.text: I will aid you as much as I can - but hurry. We have little time.
